Title: The Most Powerful Man in the World (and His Identical Twin Brother)
Writer: Tamara P. Carter (story editor), Nick Cuse (story editor), Nick Cuse, Damon Lindelof (created by), Damon Lindelof, Tom Perrotta (created by)
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Jovan Adepo
Plot: On a mission of mercy, Kevin assumes an alternate identity.
